message.content:
I need to identify and extract the value of costs related to the general management and administration of the entity as a whole from the income statement.

Looking at the provided income statement, I can see various expense categories:
- Administrative Expenses: $399,315.81
- Selling Expenses: $555,218.93
- Depreciation: $45,749.30
- Financial Expenses: $142,115.24

The costs specifically related to general management and administration of the entity would be captured in the "Administrative Expenses" line item, which amounts to $399,315.81.

In the example provided, "Administrative Expenses" was also the correct answer, which confirms my interpretation.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '399315.81'}}
```
